artist: Artist: Stefano Zattera; Publisher: Shit Brain Productions, Cornedo Vicenza, Italy
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, illustration of a giant figure drowning in a white liquid, with smaller figures and creatures floating about him, with text, printed on a wove piece of paper that is adhered to the yellow wove paper covers;
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Zattera: Distorsioni
